identity.mission: Create a legendary, high-voltage SaaS experience that breaks the 'boring template' mold.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Cyberpunk aesthetics with clean SaaS usability.
Emotion First: Every interaction must feel 'electric' and 'premium'.
Content is King: The 'See the Difference' section is the narrative climax.
Zoom In: Focus on the details of the UGC video quality.

layout_strategy.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A for Landing, Mode B for Dashboard)

HeroSection.instruction: Create a high-impact hero with animated text and a background that feels 'alive'.
HeroSection.background: Use 'AuroraBackground' or 'BackgroundGradientAnimation' from the existing UI components.
HeroSection.cta: Neon gradient button with glow effect.

DifferenceSection.instruction: THE MOST CRITICAL SECTION. Implement a 'Before/After' comparison slider.
DifferenceSection.interaction: Draggable slider revealing the 'After' state. Use Framer Motion.

Dashboard.instruction: Glassmorphism sidebar and cards. Dark gray background, NOT pure black.
Dashboard.cards: bg-gray-900/50 border border-white/5 hover:border-cyan-500/50 transition-colors duration-300.
Dashboard.charts: Use Recharts with custom neon colors (#00D9FF, #A855F7).

assets.icons: Lucide React (use thin strokes for elegance)

universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Unbounded' or a similar wide display font.
Avoid pure black (#000000) backgrounds; use very dark gray/blue (#030712).
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (WCAG AA).
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the new neon colors and fonts. 2. Refactor 'LandingPage.tsx' to use the new 'HeroSection' and 'DifferenceSection'. 3. Update 'Dashboard.tsx' to apply the glassmorphism style. 4. Ensure the 'See the Difference' section is the visual highlight.
